title: Have you met your pen pal? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have met three. They were from Germany and Russia. The Russian one turned out to be a total weirdo, but the Germans are both lovely- one stayed with me and my family a few years ago but she randomly stopped messaging me, and I have “met” the other one via Skype, after chatting with her via messenger for years. We also game together, and I actually consider her a close friend. She is actually visiting me later this year!

I haven’t personally met my pen pals but I read all the time about stories of people who’ve met. It’s gonna be pretty difficult to meet my pen pal in Mauritius. lol PEN PALS - The most rewarding social network
